name: today-i-learned
description: Hey there! Welcome to my "Today I Learned" (TIL) repo. This is where I jot down little lessons I pick up along the way—whether it’s something cool I discovered, a tricky concept I finally wrapped my head around, or just a useful tool I stumbled upon. It’s a mix of topics, from coding techniques to tech fundamentals, all helping me track my learning journey.
author: Yoon Kim
